title: Div Visser
text:
Johann De Villiers 'Div' Visser (born 26 November 1958 in <a href="Cape%20Town">Cape Town</a>, <a href="South%20Africa">South Africa</a> is a former South African <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player.
Playing career.
Visser played for <a href="Western%20Province%20%28rugby%20team%29">Western Province</a> in the South African <a href="Currie%20Cup">Currie Cup</a> competition. 
Visser made his debut for the <a href="Springboks">Springboks</a> during the <a href="1981%20South%20Africa%20rugby%20union%20tour%20of%20New%20Zealand%20and%20the%20United%20States">1981 tour of New Zealand</a> in the second test on 29 August 1981 at <a href="Athletic%20Park%2C%20Wellington">Athletic Park</a>, <a href="Wellington%20New%20Zealand">Wellington</a>, New Zealand. He also played in the Springboks' first ever test against the <a href="USA%20Rugby">USA</a> on 20 September 1981 at the Owl Creek Polo ground in <a href="Glenville%2C%20New%20York">Glenville, New York</a>. Visser also played in 10 tour matches for the Springboks, in which he scored four tries.
